returns._0: The address of the deployment. May be `address(0)` if the deployment does not         exist.
Whether the deployment exists or not.

loadInitializedSlot(string).details: Returns the value of the internal `_initialized` storage slot for a given contract.

params._addr: The mock address of the deployment.

archivePreviousOpChainFaucetsDrippieConf.notice: archives the previous OP Chain drip configs.

get(string).notice: Returns a deployment that is suitable to be used to interact with contracts.

getAbi(string).notice: Returns the abi from a the forge artifact

getAddress(string).notice: Returns the address of a deployment. Also handles the predeploys.

getMethodIdentifiers(string).notice: Returns the methodIdentifiers from the forge artifact

getStorageLayout(string).notice: Returns the storage layout for a deployed contract.

has(string).notice: Returns whether or not a particular deployment exists.

installFaucetAdminDripV1().notice: installs the FaucetAdminDripV1 drip on the faucet drippie contract.

installFaucetAuthModulesConfigs().notice: installs all of the auth module in the faucet contract.

installFaucetDripV1().notice: installs the FaucetDripV1 drip on the faucet drippie contract.

installFaucetDripV2().notice: installs the FaucetDripV2 drip on the faucet drippie contract.

installFaucetDrippieConfigs().notice: installs the drip configs in the faucet drippie contract.

installFaucetGelatoBalanceV1().notice: installs the GelatoBalanceV1 drip on the faucet drippie contract.

installLargeOpChainAdminWalletDrips().notice: installs drips that send funds to the admin wallets for large OP chain faucets on the scheduled interval.

installLargeOpChainFaucetsDrips().notice: installs drips that send funds to large OP chain faucets on the scheduled interval.

installOffChainAuthModule().notice: installs the OffChain AuthModule on the Faucet contract.

installOnChainAuthModule().notice: installs the OnChain AuthModule on the Faucet contract.

installOpChainFaucetsDrippieConfigs().notice: installs drip configs that deposit funds to all OP Chain faucets. This function should only be called on an L1 testnet.

installSmallOpChainAdminWalletDrips().notice: installs drips that send funds to the admin wallets for small OP chain faucets on the scheduled interval.

installSmallOpChainFaucetsDrips().notice: installs drips that send funds to small OP chain faucets on the scheduled interval.

mustGetAddress(string).notice: Returns the address of a deployment and reverts if the deployment         does not exist.

name().notice: The name of the script, used to ensure the right deploy artifacts         are used.

newDeployments().notice: Returns all of the deployments done in the current context.

run().notice: Deploy all of the periphery contracts

save(string,address).notice: Appends a deployment to disk as a JSON deploy artifact.

setUp().notice: Create the global variables and set up the filesystem.         Forge script will create a file where the prefix is the         name of the function that runs with the suffix `-latest.json`.         By default, `run()` is called. Allow the user to use the SIG         env var to specify what function signature was called so that         the `sync()` method can be used to create hardhat deploy style         artifacts.

archivePreviousOpChainFaucetsDrippieConf.notice: archives the previous OP Chain drip configs.

get(string).notice: Returns a deployment that is suitable to be used to interact with contracts.

getAbi(string).notice: Returns the abi from a the forge artifact

getAddress(string).notice: Returns the address of a deployment. Also handles the predeploys.

getMethodIdentifiers(string).notice: Returns the methodIdentifiers from the forge artifact

getStorageLayout(string).notice: Returns the storage layout for a deployed contract.

has(string).notice: Returns whether or not a particular deployment exists.

installFaucetAdminDripV1().notice: installs the FaucetAdminDripV1 drip on the faucet drippie contract.

installFaucetAuthModulesConfigs().notice: installs all of the auth module in the faucet contract.

installFaucetDripV1().notice: installs the FaucetDripV1 drip on the faucet drippie contract.

installFaucetDripV2().notice: installs the FaucetDripV2 drip on the faucet drippie contract.

installFaucetDrippieConfigs().notice: installs the drip configs in the faucet drippie contract.

installFaucetGelatoBalanceV1().notice: installs the GelatoBalanceV1 drip on the faucet drippie contract.

installLargeOpChainAdminWalletDrips().notice: installs drips that send funds to the admin wallets for large OP chain faucets on the scheduled interval.

installLargeOpChainFaucetsDrips().notice: installs drips that send funds to large OP chain faucets on the scheduled interval.

installOffChainAuthModule().notice: installs the OffChain AuthModule on the Faucet contract.

installOnChainAuthModule().notice: installs the OnChain AuthModule on the Faucet contract.

installOpChainFaucetsDrippieConfigs().notice: installs drip configs that deposit funds to all OP Chain faucets. This function should only be called on an L1 testnet.

installSmallOpChainAdminWalletDrips().notice: installs drips that send funds to the admin wallets for small OP chain faucets on the scheduled interval.

installSmallOpChainFaucetsDrips().notice: installs drips that send funds to small OP chain faucets on the scheduled interval.

mustGetAddress(string).notice: Returns the address of a deployment and reverts if the deployment         does not exist.

name().notice: The name of the script, used to ensure the right deploy artifacts         are used.

newDeployments().notice: Returns all of the deployments done in the current context.

run().notice: Deploy all of the periphery contracts

save(string,address).notice: Appends a deployment to disk as a JSON deploy artifact.

setUp().notice: Create the global variables and set up the filesystem.         Forge script will create a file where the prefix is the         name of the function that runs with the suffix `-latest.json`.         By default, `run()` is called. Allow the user to use the SIG         env var to specify what function signature was called so that         the `sync()` method can be used to create hardhat deploy style         artifacts.

DeploymentDoesNotExist(string).notice: Error for when attempting to fetch a deployment and it does not exist

InvalidDeployment(string).notice: Error for when trying to save an invalid deployment

userdoc.notice: Script used to deploy periphery contracts.

returns._0: The address of the deployment. May be `address(0)` if the deployment does not         exist.
Whether the deployment exists or not.

loadInitializedSlot(string).details: Returns the value of the internal `_initialized` storage slot for a given contract.

params._addr: The mock address of the deployment.
